DOC.detailed_description: The Emergency Department use E-series unit manufacture ZOLL Medical Group ( Chelmsford , MA ) . These unit equip accelerometer-based system allow measurement chest compression depth rate . These unit also equip RealCPRHelp , FDA-approved technology provide real-time audiovisual feedback provider quality chest compression . In first phase project , ED provider utilize E-series unit treat patient require chest compression .
